name: Gardening
description: Learn to grow a garden! Here you can learn to compost, keep your garden lovely, and make beautiful flower arrangements. You can also earn a Desert Landscape School Credential.

name: Sewing
description: Get the sewing machine out of your closet and set it up! Learn to sew and quilt here. You can take lessons to become a true clothes designer. You can also learn embroidery and knitting - have fun!

name: Music
description: Bring beautiful music into your life with music lessons. Play the instrument of your dreams - be the Rock Star you were meant to be!

name: Art
description: Learn pottery, drawing, and painting. There are also classes for jewelry making and glass blowing - bring joy and imagination to your life.

name: Cooking
description: Stop burning your food! Learn to cook with cooking lessons and cook like the Pros. There are also small group classes and large events to help you get your baking on.

name: Outdoor Life
description: Get some fresh air - go hiking, biking and camping. Take a guided tour, or grab a map and take yourself out to the wilderness. Find those lost waterfalls and beautiful streams - make some memories!
